showing.translation[0].definitions[0].de: an occasion when a film, art show etc can be seen or looked at, especially a special occasion that people are invited to
showing.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I saw a private showing of the film.
It was the comedy’s first showing on TV.
showing.translation[0].definitions[1].de: used to talk about a person’s or thing’s level of success
showing.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Choose the candidate who makes the best showing in the interview.
Women made a strong showing in the election.
On present showing  (=judging by the way it is now), there’s a lot to do to get the newspaper’s sales up.
On this showing  (=judging by this example), she is becoming a very good writer indeed.
